name: Relentless Rage
description: Your Rage can keep you fighting despite grievous wounds. If you drop to 0 Hit Points while your Rage is active and donâ€™t die outright, you can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. If you succeed, your Hit Points instead change to a number equal to twice your Barbarian level.
Each time you use this feature after the first, the DC increases by 5. When you finish a Short or Long Rest, the DC resets to 10.
